Title: The Terror Within
Writer: Joshua Hamilton, Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, Mindy Sterling, Seychelle Gabriel
Plot: As Opal leaves for the Northern Air Temple to start her airbending training, Zaheer and his gang try to kidnap Korra. Although Korra's friends are able to prevent this following a climactic fight, they suspect that someone inside Zaofu has been aiding the enemy.
